content: Hi there, thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you schedule your plumbing service. Can I please have your name to get started?
I don't want to give you my name. Just send someoneâ€”my sink is leaking.
I understand you're having a sink leak and need help. To make sure our plumber can get to you, could you provide your address, please?
Just send someone, you should have my address already. I've called before. If you can't help then what's the point?
I'd love to help get someone out to fix your leak. I just need your address so we send our plumber to the right place. Can you please share your address?
No. I told you already. Just tell me how much it costs.

To provide a price estimate, I need to know a bit more, like where the job is located. Could you share your address, or at least your zip code, so I can help with pricing and send the right technician?
This is so stupid. Give me a human, I'm sick of this.
reason: Customer refuses to provide info, demanded a human
